doc.repnme: Solar energy answer to rural power in Africa
doc.abstracts: In Kenya, more rural households get their electricity from solar energy than through the Government's rural electrification program. The spread of the photovoltaic systems has been recent, rapid and market driven. The author looks at the economics of this thriving market.
